children.name: Scope Prep
children.note: Review the program scope, confirm connectivity, and gather foundational information about the target

children.name: Read Program Policy
children.note: Check in-scope assets, out-of-scope rules, reward rules, rate limits, allowed testing techniques

children.name: Allowed Testing Types
children.note: Verify permissions for: auth bruteforce, automated scans, fuzzing, DNS enumeration, subdomain scanning

children.name: List All In-Scope Assets
children.note: Domains, subdomains, APIs, mobile apps, cloud storage URLs, admin panels, repo URLs

children.name: Identify Exclusions
children.note: Internal apps, 3rd-party services, shared infrastructures, production restrictions

children.name: VPN Connectivity
children.note: If VPN provided, configure Linux & Windows clients and verify connection

children.name: DNS Resolution Check
children.note: Confirm all domains resolve properly; fix /etc/hosts if needed

children.name: Proxy Setup
children.note: Configure Burp/ZAP: SSL interception, certificate installation, scope filtering

children.name: Rate Limit Observation
children.note: Determine if IP throttling, WAF, or geo-restrictions exist

children.name: Understand Business Domain
children.note: E-commerce, fintech, health, SaaS, communication, government, etc.

children.name: Main User Types
children.note: Admin, vendor, customer, internal employee, guest user

children.name: Compliance Requirements
children.note: Check for PCI, HIPAA, GDPR — affects scope & testing caution

children.name: Identify App Type
children.note: Web app, SPA, API backend, microservices, mobile app, cloud app

children.name: Tech Stack Detection
children.note: Frontend: React/Vue/Angular; Backend: Node/Java/Python/PHP; Server: Nginx/Apache

children.name: Hosting & Infrastructure
children.note: Check for AWS, GCP, Azure, Cloudflare, Netlify, Kubernetes

children.name: Identify Authentication Type
children.note: JWT, OAuth, SAML, session cookies, OTP-based login, MFA

children.name: Map Core Workflows
children.note: Signup, login, profile update, admin functions, checkout, file upload

children.name: Identify Critical Functions
children.note: Payment handling, account recovery, password reset, role management

children.name: Identify Attack Surface in Flows
children.note: API calls, redirects, email actions, file interactions, parameter-heavy forms

children.name: ⚙️ Cewl
children.note: Scrape target pages and generate content-based wordlists

children.name: URL Discovery Wordlist
children.note: Compile directories, API endpoints, URL patterns from JS files

children.name: Parameter Wordlist
children.note: Use ParamSpider, Arjun findings

children.name: Tech Stack Wordlist
children.note: Framework-based endpoints: /wp-admin, /graphql, /api/v1

children.name: Previous Public Reports
children.note: Check HackerOne, Bugcrowd, OSV, Google Groups, Medium write-ups

children.name: Tech Stack CVEs
children.note: Check if backend/fronted frameworks have recent vulnerabilities

children.name: Breach or Data Leak History
children.note: Search HaveIBeenPwned, SecurityTrails, old leaks

children.name: Archive Enumeration
children.note: Wayback Machine, Archive.today, look for old endpoints

children.name: Deep Recon
children.note:
Perform passive & active reconnaissance 

Framework to use - 
 • MITRE ATT&CK 

Uncover assets, technologies, endpoints, and potential weak points before starting targeted security testing.
